description.value:
Trigger You or an ally within 30 feet of your star orb familiar would be reduced to 0 Hit Points but not immediately killed.

You temporarily drain your star orb familiar's energy to save an ally. The target avoids being knocked out and remains at 1 Hit Point, and their wounded condition increases by 1. The target then regains Hit Points equal to your level. When the familiar's energy is drained, it becomes dormant until your next daily preparations.
